statements: SELECT * FROM production_schedule WHERE schedule_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, start_date, end_date FROM production_schedule WHERE assigned_person = 'John';
SELECT * FROM production_schedule WHERE end_date > '2022-10-01';
SELECT schedule_id, assigned_person, task_description FROM production_schedule ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, start_date, end_date, assigned_person FROM production_schedule WHERE task_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM production_schedule ORDER BY product_name DESC, start_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, assigned_person FROM production_schedule WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT schedule_id, product_name, start_date, end_date, assigned_person FROM production_schedule WHERE task_description IS NOT NULL AND assigned_person = 'Alice' ORDER BY start_date LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT DISTINCT assigned_person FROM production_schedule WHERE product_name LIKE '%chair%';
SELECT * FROM production_schedule WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND (product_name = 'Table' OR assigned_person = 'Bob') ORDER BY end_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM production_schedules;
SELECT product_name, scheduled_date FROM production_schedules;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks;
SELECT assigned_to, task_name, schedule_id FROM tasks;
SELECT product_name, scheduled_date, task_id FROM production_schedules;
SELECT * FROM production_schedules WHERE schedule_id = 1
SELECT product_name, scheduled_date FROM production_schedules WHERE scheduled_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY task_name DESC
SELECT task_description, assigned_to FROM tasks WHERE assigned_to LIKE 'John%' OR assigned_to LIKE 'Emily%'
SELECT ps.schedule_id, t.task_name, ps.product_name FROM production_schedules AS ps JOIN tasks AS t ON ps.task_id = t.task_id
SELECT * FROM production_schedule;
SELECT task_name, end_date, start_date FROM production_schedule;
SELECT status, task_description FROM task;
SELECT facility_name, location from facility;
SELECT task_description FROM task WHERE status='In Progress';
SELECT * FROM production_schedule WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01' AND end_date <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT task_name, start_date, end_date FROM production_schedule ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_description, assigned_to FROM task WHERE status = 'InProgress';
SELECT task_name, start_date, end_date, facility_name FROM production_schedule JOIN facility ON production_schedule.id = facility.facility_id;
SELECT * FROM facility WHERE facility_name LIKE '%Production%' AND location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM production_schedule;
SELECT production_name, start_date, end_date FROM production_schedule WHERE production_id = 2;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, due_date FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, due_date FROM tasks ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM bioproduction_facilities WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM production_schedule;
SELECT production_name, start_date, end_date FROM production_schedule WHERE production_name='Example Production';
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM tasks WHERE task_status='Pending' ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, due_date FROM tasks WHERE assigned_to='John Doe' AND due_date >= '2022-12-01';
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM bioproduction_facilities ORDER BY capacity DESC, facility_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_schedule;
SELECT product_name, start_date, end_date FROM production_schedule WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT facility_name, production_capacity FROM bioproduction_facilities WHERE production_capacity > 10000;
SELECT task_name, equipment_required, assigned_to FROM production_tasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT employee_name, department, phone_number FROM employee_details WHERE department = 'Production' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_schedule WHERE product_name='XYZ'
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM production_tasks WHERE assigned_to='John Doe'
SELECT facility_name, location, production_capacity FROM bioproduction_facilities WHERE production_capacity > 100
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_details WHERE department='Engineering'
SELECT * FROM task_assignments ORDER BY assignment_date DESC
